column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: An incident occurred at Maybank in Boeung Keng Kang I when a white male got into an altercation with staff over issues with withdrawing money from the ATM.------The incident occurred on Wednesday afternoon
column7: Street 63 in Boeung Keng Kang I
column9: Phnom Penh.------The arrested foreigners has not been identified (yet).  After the incident
column10: the suspect was taken to BKK1 police office to continue the proceedings.------UPDATE: After staff at Maybank decided not to file a complaint
column12: made him sign a contract agreeing to never attack bank staff again
column13: and was let go on his merry way.------Source
